login.heading: Mevcut SARDIS cüzdanınıza buradan erişin.
login.forgot_password: Şifrenizi mi unuttunuz? Anımsatıcı kullanarak sıfırlayın

signup.heading: SARDIS göndermek ve almak için yeni bir cüzdan oluşturun.

setup.heading: Setup your email and other information.

onboard.heading: This is your key phrase.
onboard.lead: Use these 24 words in sequential order to recover your SARDIS Wallet
onboard.info: STORE THIS KEY PHRASE IN A SECURE LOCATION. ANYONE WITH THIS KEY PHRASE CAN ACCESS YOUR AVALANCHE WALLET. THERE IS NO WAY TO RECOVER LOST KEY PHRASES.
onboard.checkbox: I wrote down my key phrase in a secure location.

2fa.heading: Setup 2FA
2fa.otp_placeholder: Scan QR Code in Google Authenticator and enter OTP.
2fa.verify_otp_placeholder: Enter OTP from Google Authenticator here

wallet.assets_empty_message: It's empty here. Send some SRDS to your wallet.
wallet.transactions_empty_message: Send or receive something to see your transactions.

referral.heading: Refer Sardis to your friends, you both earn 10% on their first purchase.
referral.referrals_heading: Friends who have signed up with your unique link
referral.referrals_empty_message: Feeling lonely here? You can invite your friends to join Sardis
referral.rewards_empty_message: You haven't earned any rewards yet.
